verbs.description: [ARG0: picasso check sketch] [V: fetches] [ARG1: 6 500] [ARGM-LOC: at auction] london ap thirty - one years ago pablo picasso received a 100 check from an art lover who asked for a picture the artist returned the check with a sketch in mauve felt - tip pen of a smiling li paul cézanne christie la maison du jas de bouffan 6 500 london christies at auction edgar degas pablo picasso paul cezanne
